You're all a bunch of cunts for stealing this, it's 10 bucks for crying out loud, if you're such fans why wouldn't support their efforts, Ok they've made money touring but this downloading malarkey really hurts the smaller fish and pioneers out there who won't be able to put out more music because they're too busy bussing tables to pay the rent while the mainstream 'bilge water' music industry goes on with corporate partnering and arena filling vacuousness. At least half of all you illegal downloads are pointless because you don't properly listen to any of it, try investing yourselves in just the stuff that appeals to you and commit to buying some stuff, trust me, your life will improved.
